Package amelia.invoice

package amelia.invoice
Handles invoice-related logic and data structures.

Includes invoice models and core invoice utilities shared across different interfaces.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    amelia
    Root package for the ShopManager Pro project.
    amelia.invoice.GUI
    GUI components for managing invoices.
    amelia.customer
    Handles customer-related logic and shared classes.
    amelia.product
    Handles product-related logic and utilities.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Invoice
    Represents an invoice that includes customer info, a list of items, the invoice date, and total amount.
    InvoiceDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) for handling invoice-related operations with the database.
    InvoiceItem
    Represents a single item in an invoice.
    InvoicePanel
    A custom panel used to create an invoice.
